sentence.Network_en: Confronted with brute facts, Mr. Baldwin had recoiled.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍德温先生遇到残酷的事实就退回来.

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Baldwin was, of course, not moved by any ignoble wish to remain in office.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲍德温先生当然不是出于想继续做官这个卑劣的动机.

sentence.Network_en: Yet this is thirty - fourth month since Lord Baldwin decided that the air force must be tripled.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是,自鲍得温勋爵作出决定把空军扩充三倍到现在,已经是第三十四个月了.
